item.description: Okay knit sibs, slight change of location this week. Because the cafe is going to be closed including the seating area during the cafe construction, Heather suggested that we make our group official with Borders and they would reserve a table for us in Arts or Business areas. So I talked to Borders and set it up. So on Sunday, look for our reserved table somewhere in Arts or Business...
item.name: Sunday Afternoon Gathering!!!
